q1.question: How do I qualify for the 144-hour visa-free transit?
q1.answer: You must be a citizen of one of the 53 eligible countries, have a confirmed onward ticket to a third country, and enter through designated ports.

q2.question: Can I extend my 144-hour stay?
q2.answer: No, the 144-hour visa-free transit cannot be extended. You must depart within the allocated time frame.

q3.question: What areas can I visit during my stay?
q3.answer: You can travel within the designated administrative regions of your entry city. Each city has specific boundaries you must respect.

q4.question: Do you provide 24/7 support during my trip?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency support for all our clients throughout their stay in China.
